summary: This is an email chain forwarding a voice message from attorney David Hall to the SDNY regarding the Epstein case. Diane Gujarati, an AUSA, forwards the message to Maurene Comey, seeking guidance on whether to return the call from Hall, who was referred by a former AUSA in Cleveland.

persons.name: Diane Gujarati
persons.context: Forwards a voice message from attorney David Hall to Maurene Comey regarding the Epstein case, seeking guidance on whether to return the call.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Recipient of the forwarded message from Diane Gujarati; likely involved in the Epstein case at SDNY.

persons.name: David Hall
persons.context: Left a voice message for Diane Gujarati regarding the Epstein case; was referred by a former AUSA in Cleveland.

connections.description: Colleagues at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY); Gujarati is forwarding a case-related message to Comey.
Hall, an attorney, left a voice message for Gujarati regarding the Epstein case, seeking contact with SDNY.
The former AUSA in Cleveland referred Hall to Diane Gujarati, providing her contact information.

events.title: Voice Message from Attorney David Hall
events.description: Attorney David Hall leaves a voice message for AUSA Diane Gujarati regarding the Epstein case, seeking contact with the SDNY.

keyFacts: Attorney David Hall contacted the SDNY regarding the Epstein case in November 2019.
Hall was referred to AUSA Diane Gujarati by a former AUSA in Cleveland.
The communication shows external legal professionals attempting to reach the SDNY Epstein prosecution team.
